info.name: MCP Server Integration Demo
info.description:
Demonstrates how to integrate popular MCP servers with Postman for enhanced API testing and automation.

üîß **Real GitHub Remote MCP Server Integration**
This collection connects to the official GitHub Remote MCP server at api.githubcopilot.com for real GitHub operations!

üîë **Dynamic Authentication**
‚Ä¢ GitHub Personal Access Token is auto-loaded from .env.local
‚Ä¢ Token has 'repo' scope for full functionality
‚Ä¢ Ready to test real GitHub operations

üìã **What's Included**
‚Ä¢ GitHub Remote MCP Server (real repositories, issues)
‚Ä¢ File System MCP (read files, search files)
‚Ä¢ Web Search MCP (search, weather data)
‚Ä¢ Database MCP (query execution)
‚Ä¢ Multi-MCP Orchestration (combine multiple servers)

‚úÖ **Ready to Use**
‚Ä¢ Real GitHub MCP server integration
‚Ä¢ Official GitHub Copilot MCP endpoints
‚Ä¢ Proper MCP protocol implementation
‚Ä¢ Auto-configured authentication from .env.local
‚Ä¢ Clear error messages and setup instructions

üéØ **Perfect for Learning**
‚Ä¢ See how real MCP server integration works
‚Ä¢ Understand the MCP protocol with GitHub
‚Ä¢ Learn Postman script best practices
‚Ä¢ Explore official GitHub MCP tools

üöÄ **Quick Start**
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. GitHub token is auto-loaded from .env.local
3. Run the GitHub requests to see real data
4. Try the 'Test GitHub Token' request first to verify authentication
